subject: As a customer, I want to have a MacOS app, so that I can install and use it as a desktop app.
Integrate Taiga backlog
description:
As a poker game organizer
I want to add the sprint backlog as a list of issues into the delta_poker
So that we can discuss the sprint backlog points in a game

subject: As a customer, I want to have a Windows app, so that I can install and use it as a desktop app.
As a customer, I want to have a web application, so that I can interact with it in web bowser.
Fix the exception caused when server is not connected
description: As a planning poker player i don't want to see any exceptions when not connected o the server

subject: As a customer, I want to have the CLI run smoothly on any major operating system, so that I don't have any compatability problem.
Modify Taiga story points after consensus
description:
As a pokerplanning organizer
I want the delta_poker to change the Taiga storypoints once a consensus is reached
So that the decisions made after the game reflects back in Taiga automatically

subject: As a customer, I want to have the web page run smoothly on any major operating system, so that I don't have any compatability problem.
As a agilist, I want to have a Scrum Master role, so that Scrum Master can manage players on a team.
description: As a agilist, I want to have a Scrum Master role, so that Scrum Master can manage players on a team.

subject: As a agilist, I want to have a Product Owner role in the poker app, so that Product Owner can add user stories and issues.
As an organizer, I want to be able to save the game state, so that I can continue it next time.
As an organizer, I want to be able to save all the game activities, so that I can export it and save all the information.
Identify high and low score
description:
As a pokerplanning organizer
I want to see the high and low scored players
So that they can then enter into discussion

subject: Discussion Board
description:
As a planningpoker player
I want a discussion board where the high and low score players discuss over the issues
So that a consensus can be reached

subject: Provide ability to auto-locate server on the LAN
description: As a user it is quite tedious to manually connect to the server I want the program to auto-locate the server and connect to it.

subject: Change Score after discussion
description:
As a pokerplanning player in discussion board
I want to change my score if I agree to the other person's views
So that we end the discussion with the consensus

subject: Change "issues" to "user stories"
description: find all the issue that we find later in the development phase and make a user stories out of them

subject: Repeated Discussions
description:
As a pokerplanning organizer
I want the discussion board to continue for high and low score players
Until all the scores match

subject: develop a web page for planning poker
description: As i user i would like to have a working web interface for planning poker
tags: theme 2: gui,theme 1: features to core behavior,theme 3: tool integration

subject: Assumptions in vote_issue command
description:
As a pokerplanning player
I want to enter my assumption during vote_issue
So that my idea while making the score can be recorded

subject: Modify Story Point to user story in a sprint
description: As a scrum master, I'll be able to modify story point to user story from a sprint so that i can update the story
tags: theme 3: tool integration,theme 1: features to core behavior

subject: Discussion Board history
description:
As a pokerplanning organizer
I want the Discussion Board history to be recorded
So that we can go over it later

subject: Modify User Story Business Value of user story in a sprint
description: As a scrum master, I'll be able to modify business value to user story from a sprint so that i can update the points
tags: theme 1: features to core behavior,theme 3: tool integration

subject: Connection with taiga from poker app
description: As a scrum master, I'll be able to import stories from tiaga given my credentials, so that I can connect to tiaga from the app

subject: History of score change
description:
As a planning poker organizer
I want to record the history of score change made per user along with their assumption statement
So that we track how the current score was reached

subject: tell the variance in everyone decision
description: As a user, i want to see a variance variable to see how much variance is their in everyone decision

subject: Import User Stories from Taiga
description: As a scrum master, I'll be able to see user stories on poker app imported from tiaga, so that I can see a list of stories with story points and Business values which can have a filter of sprint
tags: theme 1: features to core behavior,theme 3: tool integration

subject: Export Discussion History
description:
As a planning poker organizer
I want an option to export the discussions per user story and the entire discussion per game
So that we can review it if required

subject: Adding user story to Sprint Backlog
description: As a scrum master, I can add a user story to a sprint, so that I can create a sprint backlog
tags: theme 3: tool integration,theme 1: features to core behavior

subject: make a graph for GUI depending upon the point given by the user
description: AS a use i would like to see a graph of everyone allocation of points to the given story
tags: theme 2: gui,theme 3: tool integration,theme 1: features to core behavior

subject: Discussion as a comment on Taiga
description:
As a planningpoker organizer
I want the discussion board conversation as a comment on Taiga under each user story
So that we can quickly look at what directed the given story point

subject: Add list of issues from the game client
description:
As a planning poker organizer
I want to add a list of issues from the client
So that I need not quit the client everytime to add issues

subject: Find if the use is connected to the server or not
description: check  if the user is connected to the server or not

subject: Show assumptions of each player in the show_report command
description:
As a poker dealer
I want to see the assumptions made by each user in the show_report feature
So that I can see all their comments in a single place

subject: As a player, I want to be able to claim one of the existing usernames added by Scrum Master that haven't been claimed, so that I can just open terminal and claim a username.
description: As a player, I want to be able to claim one of the existing usernames added by Scrum Master that haven't been claimed, so that I can just open terminal and claim a username.

subject: Make the URL dynamic to check whether user is connected and update documentation
description:
as a user, I want the URL to the server dynamic.
so I can connect to a server located anywhere in the network and check whether the server is online or not

Also, update the dependency file for the project for new dependencies
tags: theme 4: technical debt reduction,theme 1: features to core behavior

subject: As a customer, I want to sync the poker app with the Taiga, so that all the user stories and issues in Taiga matches with poker app
Add the fetched user stories to the poker app
